titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the free and lawfull use of maulting.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Greenwich the eighteenth day of Iune, in the fourteenth yeer of His Majesties reign.
Arms 21 (with two leaves under the lion's leg); Steele notation: Proclamation the Mault-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
